com.robo.mvp

Interface ContextProvider

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractActivity, AbstractDialogFragment, AbstractExpandableListActivity, AbstractFragment, AbstractListActivity, AbstractListFragment

    public interface ContextProvider
    Provides access to Context, SharedPreferences and ContentResolver.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      android.content.ContentResolver getContentResolver()
      Return a ContentResolver instance for your application's package.
      android.content.Context getContext()
      Returns the context of this view.
      android.content.SharedPreferences getSharedPreferences(java.lang.String name, int mode)
      Gets the preferences that is shared among context objects.

    • Method Detail

        Gets the preferences that is shared among context objects.
